description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6m in depth, maximum height of 3.19m and eaves height of 2.92m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii)

Your attention is drawn to the need to comply with the relevant provisions of the Building Regulations, the Building Acts and other related legislation. These cover such works as - the demolition of existing buildings, the erection of a new building or structure, the extension or alteration to a building, change of use of buildings, installation of services, underpinning works, and fire safety/means of escape works. Notice of intention to demolish existing buildings must be given to the Council's Building Control Service at least 6 weeks before work starts. A completed application form together with detailed plans must be submitted for approval before any building work is commenced.
Please provide copies of proposed plans, which were previously approved, from the application which this application relates to. These drawings should be independant of any changes proposed

Inspection:Site inspection carried out in person on 16/11/2023.Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Acceptable works with no adverse impact upon tree health or public amenity while carrying out routine and repeat maintenance.Recommendation:Approve.
